name: ottawa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Canada, in the southeastern part of the country: He is a musician from Ottawa. That year, in Ottawa, more than 100 nations signed a major treaty banning landmines.
More examplesFewer examplesShe moved to the Bay Area from Ottawa in 1967. He runs a restaurant in downtown Ottawa.She is in the Department of Linguistics at the University of Ottawa.Many Ottawa residents are government employees and their jobs are relatively secure.
